articles.description: A new Peyton Manning era in Denver?
articles.content: Earlier this week, the Denver Broncos entered into an agreement with the Walton/Penner group in a sale of the team totaling $4.65 billion. Helmed by Walmart heir Rob Walton, the group is rounded out … [+3131 chars]
